name: The Internship (itch) (n.s.chaitanya)
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week - 149 and the theme was "Last One Left"

Give it a shot!

NOTE:  EVEN IF YOU PLAY THE GAME IN BROWSER YOUR CURRENT GAME WILL BE SAVED. SO WHEN YOU COME BACK YOU CAN START RIGHT WHERE YOU LEFT IT! IF YOU NOTICE ANY NETWORK ISSUES ON YOUR COMPUTER, PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR YOUR SUITABLE PLATFORM.

You have passed all the rounds to get a job and the last one left is "The Internship". Based on your performance you will get a permanent job. But if you don't perform well, you will be fired. Meet customers demands and be faster as you type and select the color of choice they request you. 

There is a simple mode in which you can just type and there's no color picking. Try it if you are interested.

You have obstacles like colleagues who change your order of the colors, customers who request lengthy words with numbers and special characters. 

Take part in this new and fresh typing game "The Internship" and suggest me if you have any thoughts.

And try to play the game without looking at the keyboard :)

Thank you.
